price: Then We raised you back to life after your death, so that you may be grateful.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
